originalBookmark.title: Exlex Minor the Idea – Simple habits, simple boat

metadata.title: Exlex Minor the Idea – Simple habits, simple boat
metadata.description: August 2018 Yrvind is back home. There is many things to sort out, for example to get a new internet connection. As soon I am settled I will start working this site and build a new and better boat …
metadata.author: Yrvind
